title: How many millions is 7 billion? - Quora

response.answer_text: this is a word problem. it means 1,000,00 times N = 7,000,0000,000 count the zeros in one million (there are 6) and seven billion (there are 9) and since you divide (opposite of times or multiplying) to get the answer you can subtract the two numbers. Since the answer is the larger number you take it’s count (9) minus the other numbers count (6) and get 3 the answer is a 1 followed by 3 zeros or one thousand (1,000) times 7 or 7,000.

Many say 50 years ago at least a billion was a million million, however I am given to understand that under influence from America we the UK fell in line with The American value which now exists which is that a billion is 1000 million. On that basis 7 billion is 7000 million.
